#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

#define gi(n) scanf("%d",&n);
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int t;
    gi(t);

    while(t-- >0)
    {
        int n;
        gi(n);
        bool ok = false;
        int Q = n/7;
        for(int f=Q;f>=0;f--)
        {
            int R = n-(f*7);
            if(R%4==0)
            {
                printf("%d\n",f*7);
                ok = true;
                break;
            }
        }

        if(!ok) printf("-1\n");
    }

    return 0;
}
